name: Smart meter X100
description: An advanced smart meter for accurate monitoring and analysis of energy consumption in real time.

name: Energy monitoring system Y2000
description: A complete system for monitoring and analyzing energy consumption in a building or industrial plant.

name: Smart thermostat Z300
description: An intelligent thermostat that optimizes heating and cooling based on user behaviors and energy efficiency.

name: Energy optimization software A400
description: Powerful software to optimize energy use and identify energy saving opportunities in an industrial plant.

name: Solar panel system B5000
description: A complete solar panel system to produce renewable energy and reduce dependence on traditional energy sources.

name: Energy storage system C600
description: Advanced battery storage system to store and use excess generated energy for later use.

name: Intelligent lighting system D700
description: A smart lighting system that automatically adapts to optimize energy efficiency based on presence and lighting conditions.

name: Load control system E800
description: A system to optimize and balance loads to avoid overload and maximize the efficiency of a facility.

name: Energy consumption monitor F900
description: A user-friendly device to monitor and visualize energy consumption in real time and help identify savings opportunities.

name: Power factor compensation system G1000
description: A system that compensates for low power factor and optimizes the grid's reliability and energy efficiency.
